data.message: Debug and fix promotion compactor enum serialization bug: Found root cause: asdict() preserves enum objects, json.dump() fails mid-write causing truncated files. Fixed by adding data['type'] = candidate.type.value. Committed 707804b, all tests pass.
data.task: Debug and fix promotion compactor enum serialization bug
data.outcome: Found root cause: asdict() preserves enum objects, json.dump() fails mid-write causing truncated files. Fixed by adding data['type'] = candidate.type.value. Committed 707804b, all tests pass.
